title: 98/172/EC: Commission Decision of 17 February 1998 amending Council Decision 95/514/EC on the equivalence of field inspections carried out in third countries on seed producing crops and on the equivalence of seed produced in third countries
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 17 February 1998 amending Council Decision 95/514/EC on the equivalence of field inspections carried out in third countries on seed producing crops and on the equivalence of seed produced in third countries (98/172/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: In the entry relating to Turkey in Part I of the Annex to Decision 95/514/EC, '66/401/EEC` is inserted after the entry relating to '66/400/EEC`.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 17 February 1998.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
